subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
Swimming
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps, the 22-time Olympic swimming medalist, played in Tuesday’s celebrity scramble at Medinah Country Club, where the Ryder Cup will begin on Friday.
snippet: Michael Phelps, the 22-time Olympic swimming medalist, played in Tuesday’s celebrity scramble at Medinah Country Club, where the Ryder Cup will begin on Friday.
